channel.title: Rinn'thalas Liadon on tlake.io
channel.description: Recent content in Rinn'thalas Liadon on tlake.io

item.title: A Study in Synthwave
item.description: Psithyron displays his latest masterpiece. Gray opens up more about his family. A desperate message from Finn is foreseen, and a gnome returns. The party considers their options, and a bold, but likely foolish plan is made.

item.title: Rinn'thalas Liadon
item.description: Rinn’thalas Liadon Wood Elf Horizon Walker Ranger DND Beyond Description Appearance Personality Biography Background With Menagerie in Baator Relationships Ze’brak Gorstag Character Info Quests Deliver a letter to the party (a favor for Gorstag orchestrated by Gimble) Find his lost friend, Ze’brak Notable Items Quotations Trivia
